trans-unit.source: Quantifiers in regular expressions
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式中的限定符

trans-unit.source: Quantifiers in regular expressions
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式中的限定符

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core

trans-unit.source: Quantifiers in regular expressions
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式中的限定符

trans-unit.source: Quantifiers specify how many instances of a character, group, or character class must be present in the input for a match to be found.
trans-unit.target: 限定符指定输入中必须存在字符、组或字符类的多少实例才能找到匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the quantifiers supported by .NET.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了 .NET 支持的限定符。

trans-unit.source: Greedy quantifier
trans-unit.target: 贪婪限定符

trans-unit.source: Lazy quantifier
trans-unit.target: 惰性限定符

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more times.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零次或多次。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more times.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一次或多次。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one time.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零次或一次。

trans-unit.source: Match exactly n times.
trans-unit.target: 恰好匹配 n 次。

trans-unit.source: Match at least n times.
trans-unit.target: 至少匹配 n 次。

trans-unit.source: Match from n to m times.
trans-unit.target: 匹配 n 到 m 次。

trans-unit.source: The quantities *n* and *m* are integer constants.
trans-unit.target: 数量 n 和 m 是整数常量。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, quantifiers are greedy; they cause the regular expression engine to match as many occurrences of particular patterns as possible.
trans-unit.target: 通常，限定符是贪婪的；它们使正则表达式引擎匹配尽可能多的特定模式实例。

trans-unit.source: Appending the `?` character to a quantifier makes it lazy; it causes the regular expression engine to match as few occurrences as possible.
trans-unit.target: 向限定符追加 `?` 字符可使它成为惰性的；会使正则表达式引擎匹配尽可能少的实例。

trans-unit.source: For a complete description of the difference between greedy and lazy quantifiers, see the section [Greedy and lazy quantifiers](#greedy-and-lazy-quantifiers) later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关贪婪与惰性限定符之间的差异的完整说明，请参见本主题后面的[贪婪与惰性限定符](#greedy-and-lazy-quantifiers)部分。

trans-unit.source: Nesting quantifiers (for example, as the regular expression pattern `(a*)*` does) can increase the number of comparisons that the regular expression engine must perform, as an exponential function of the number of characters in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套限定符（例如正则表达式模式 `(a*)*` 的行为）可以按输入字符串中的字符数的指数函数形式，来增加正则表达式引擎必须执行的比较次数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this behavior and its workarounds, see [Backtracking in regular expressions](backtracking.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此行为及其解决方法的更多信息，请参见[正则表达式中的回溯](backtracking.md)。

trans-unit.source: Regular expression quantifiers
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式限定符

trans-unit.source: The following sections list the quantifiers supported by .NET regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 以下部分列出了 .NET 正则表达式支持的限定符。

trans-unit.source: If the \*, +, ?, {, and } characters are encountered in a regular expression pattern, the regular expression engine interprets them as quantifiers or part of quantifier constructs unless they are included in a [character class](classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果在正则表达式模式中遇到 \*、+、?、{ 和 }字符，则正则表达式引擎会将它们解释为限定符或限定符构造的一部分，除非它们包含在[字符类](classes.md)中。

trans-unit.source: To interpret these as literal characters outside a character class, you must escape them by preceding them with a backslash.
trans-unit.target: 若要在字符类外部将这些字符解释文本字符，必须通过在它们前面加反斜杠来对它们进行转义。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `\*` in a regular expression pattern is interpreted as a literal asterisk ("*") character.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式模式中的字符串 `\*` 会解释为文本星号（“*”）字符。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more times: \*
trans-unit.target: 匹配零次或多次：\*

trans-unit.source: The \* quantifier matches the preceding element zero or more times.
trans-unit.target: \* 限定符与前面的元素匹配零次或多次。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to the **{0,}** quantifier.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于 **{0,}** 限定符。

trans-unit.source: **\*** is a greedy quantifier whose lazy equivalent is **\*?**.
trans-unit.target: **\*** 是贪婪限定符，其惰性等效项是 **\*?**。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明此正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Of the nine digits in the input string, five match the pattern and four (`95`, `929`, `9129`, and `9919`) do not.
trans-unit.target: 在输入字符串中的九个数字中，五个与模式匹配，四个（`95`、`929`、`9129` 和 `9919`）不匹配。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match a "9" followed by zero or more "1" characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配后跟零个或多个“1”字符的“9”。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more "9" characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个“9”字符。

trans-unit.source: End at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在字边界结束。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more times: +
trans-unit.target: 匹配一次或多次：+

trans-unit.source: The **+** quantifier matches the preceding element one or more times.
trans-unit.target: **+** 限定符与前面的元素匹配一次或多次。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to **{1,}**.
**+** is a greedy quantifier whose lazy equivalent is **+?**.
trans-unit.target: **+** 是贪婪限定符，其惰性等效项是 **+?**。

trans-unit.source: For example, the regular expression `\ban+\w*?\b` tries to match entire words that begin with the letter `a` followed by one or more instances of the letter `n`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式 `\ban+\w*?\b` 会尝试匹配以后跟字母 `n` 的一个或多个实例的字母 `a` 开头的完整单词。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明此正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression matches the words `an`, `annual`, `announcement`, and `antique`, and correctly fails to match `autumn` and `all`.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式会匹配单词 `an`、`annual`、`announcement` 和 `antique`，并且正确地无法匹配 `autumn` 和 `all`。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match an "a" followed by one or more "n" characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配后跟一个或多个“n”字符的“a”。

trans-unit.source: Match a word character zero or more times, but as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 匹配单词字符零次或多次，但次数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: End at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在字边界结束。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one time: ?
trans-unit.target: 匹配零次或一次：?

trans-unit.source: quantifier matches the preceding element zero or one time.
trans-unit.target: 限定符与前面的元素匹配零次或一次。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to **{0,1}**.
is a greedy quantifier whose lazy equivalent is **??**.
trans-unit.target: 是贪婪限定符，其惰性等效项是 **??**。

trans-unit.source: For example, the regular expression `\ban?\b` tries to match entire words that begin with the letter `a` followed by zero or one instances of the letter `n`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式 `\ban?\b` 会尝试匹配以后跟字母 `n` 的零个或一个实例的字母 `a` 开头的完整单词。

trans-unit.source: In other words, it tries to match the words `a` and `an`.
trans-unit.target: 换句话说，它会尝试匹配单词 `a` 和 `an`。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明此正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match an "a" followed by zero or one "n" character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配后跟零个或一个“n”字符的“a”。

trans-unit.source: End at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在字边界结束。

trans-unit.source: Match exactly n times: {n}
trans-unit.target: 恰好匹配 n 次：{n}

trans-unit.source: The **{**_n_**}** quantifier matches the preceding element exactly *n* times, where *n* is any integer.
trans-unit.target: **{**_n_**}** 限定符与前面的元素恰好匹配 n 次，其中 n 是任何整数。

trans-unit.source: **{**_n_**}** is a greedy quantifier whose lazy equivalent is **{**_n_**}?**.
For example, the regular expression `\b\d+\,\d{3}\b` tries to match a word boundary followed by one or more decimal digits followed by three decimal digits followed by a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式 `\b\d+\,\d{3}\b` 会尝试匹配依次后跟一个或多个十进制数字、三个十进制数字、一个单词边界的单词边界。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明此正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Match a comma character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配逗号字符。

trans-unit.source: Match three decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 匹配三个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: End at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在字边界结束。

trans-unit.source: Match at least n times: {n,}
trans-unit.target: 至少匹配 n 次：{n,}

trans-unit.source: The **{**_n_**,}** quantifier matches the preceding element at least *n* times, where *n* is any integer.
trans-unit.target: **{**_n_**,}** 限定符与前面的元素至少匹配 n 次，其中 n 是任何整数。

trans-unit.source: **{**_n_**,}** is a greedy quantifier whose lazy equivalent is **{**_n_**}?**.
For example, the regular expression `\b\d{2,}\b\D+` tries to match a word boundary followed by at least two digits followed by a word boundary and a non-digit character.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式 `\b\d{2,}\b\D+` 会尝试匹配依次后跟至少两个数字、一个单词边界和一个非数字字符的单词边界。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明此正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression fails to match the phrase "7 days" because it contains just one decimal digit, but it successfully matches the phrases "10 weeks and 300 years".
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式无法匹配短语“7 days”，因为它只包含一个十进制数字，但是它可成功匹配短语“10 weeks and 300 years”。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match at least two decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 匹配至少两个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Match a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 与字边界匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match at least one non-decimal digit.
trans-unit.target: 匹配至少一个非十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Match between n and m times: {n,m}
trans-unit.target: 匹配 n 到 m 次：{n,m}

trans-unit.source: The **{**_n_**,**_m_**}** quantifier matches the preceding element at least *n* times, but no more than *m* times, where *n* and *m* are integers.
trans-unit.target: **{**_n_**,**_m_**}** 限定符与前面的元素至少匹配 n 次，但不超过 m 次，其中 n 和 m 是整数。

trans-unit.source: **{**_n_**,**_m_**}** is a greedy quantifier whose lazy equivalent is **{**_n_**,**_m_**}?**.
In the following example, the regular expression `(00\s){2,4}` tries to match between two and four occurrences of two zero digits followed by a space.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，正则表达式 `(00\s){2,4}` 尝试与后跟一个空格的两个零数字匹配两到四次。

trans-unit.source: Note that the final portion of the input string includes this pattern five times rather than the maximum of four.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，输入字符串的最后一部分包含此模式五次，而不是最大值四次。

trans-unit.source: However, only the initial portion of this substring (up to the space and the fifth pair of zeros) matches the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只有此子字符串的初始部分（到空格和第五对零）与正则表达式模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more times (lazy match): \*?
trans-unit.target: 匹配零次或多次（惰性匹配）：\*?

trans-unit.source: quantifier matches the preceding element zero or more times, but as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 限定符与前面的元素匹配零次或多次，但次数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: It is the lazy counterpart of the greedy quantifier **\***.
trans-unit.target: 它是贪婪限定符 **\*** 的惰性对应项。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the regular expression `\b\w*?oo\w*?\b` matches all words that contain the string `oo`.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，正则表达式 `\b\w*?oo\w*?\b` 匹配包含字符串 `oo` 的所有单词。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more word characters, but as few characters as possible.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个单词字符，但字符要尽可能的少。

trans-unit.source: Match the string "oo".
trans-unit.target: 匹配字符串“oo”。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more word characters, but as few characters as possible.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个单词字符，但字符要尽可能的少。

trans-unit.source: End on a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处结束。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more times (lazy match): +?
trans-unit.target: 匹配一次或多次（惰性匹配）：+?

trans-unit.source: quantifier matches the preceding element one or more times, but as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 限定符与前面的元素匹配一次或多次，但次数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: It is the lazy counterpart of the greedy quantifier **+**.
trans-unit.target: 它是贪婪限定符 **+** 的惰性对应项。

trans-unit.source: For example, the regular expression `\b\w+?\b` matches one or more characters separated by word boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式 `\b\w+?\b` 匹配由单词边界分隔的一个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明此正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one time (lazy match): ??
trans-unit.target: 匹配零次或一次（惰性匹配）：??

trans-unit.source: quantifier matches the preceding element zero or one time, but as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 限定符与前面的元素匹配零次或一次，但次数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: It is the lazy counterpart of the greedy quantifier **?**.
trans-unit.target: 它是贪婪限定符 **?** 的惰性对应项。

trans-unit.source: For example, the regular expression `^\s*(System.)??Console.Write(Line)??\(??` attempts to match the strings "Console.Write" or "Console.WriteLine".
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式 `^\s*(System.)??Console.Write(Line)??\(??` 尝试匹配字符串“Console.Write”或“Console.WriteLine”。

trans-unit.source: The string can also include "System."
trans-unit.target: 字符串还可以在“Console”前面包含“System.”，

trans-unit.source: before "Console", and it can be followed by an opening parenthesis.
trans-unit.target: 并且可以后跟左括号。

trans-unit.source: The string must be at the beginning of a line, although it can be preceded by white space.
trans-unit.target: 字符串必须处于行的开头，不过前面可以是空格。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明此正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match the start of the input stream.
trans-unit.target: 匹配输入流的开头。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of the string "System.".
trans-unit.target: 匹配字符串“System.”的零个或一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Match the string "Console.Write".
trans-unit.target: 匹配字符串“Console.Write”。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of the string "Line".
trans-unit.target: 匹配字符串“Line”的零个或一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of the opening parenthesis.
trans-unit.target: 匹配左括号的零个或一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Match exactly n times (lazy match): {n}?
trans-unit.target: 恰好匹配 n 次（惰性匹配）：{n}?

trans-unit.source: quantifier matches the preceding element exactly *n* times, where *n* is any integer.
trans-unit.target: 限定符与前面的元素恰好匹配 n 次，其中 n 是任何整数。

trans-unit.source: It is the lazy counterpart of the greedy quantifier **{**_n_**}+**.
trans-unit.target: 它是贪婪限定符 **{**_n_**}+** 的惰性对应项。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the regular expression `\b(\w{3,}?\.){2}?\w{3,}?\b` is used to identify a Web site address.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，正则表达式 `\b(\w{3,}?\.){2}?\w{3,}?\b` 用于标识网站地址。

trans-unit.source: Note that it matches "www.microsoft.com" and "msdn.microsoft.com", but does not match "mywebsite" or "mycompany.com".
trans-unit.target: 请注意，它匹配“www.microsoft.com”和“msdn.microsoft.com”，但不匹配“mywebsite”或“mycompany.com”。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match at least 3 word characters, but as few characters as possible, followed by a dot or period character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配至少 3 个后跟一个点或句点字符的单词字符，但字符数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: This is the first capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 这是第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Match the pattern in the first group two times, but as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 匹配第一个组中的模式两次，但次数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: End the match on a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处结束匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match at least n times (lazy match): {n,}?
trans-unit.target: 至少匹配 n 次（惰性匹配）：{n,}?

trans-unit.source: quantifier matches the preceding element at least *n* times, where *n* is any integer, but as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 限定符与前面的元素至少匹配 n 次，其中 n 是任何整数，但次数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: It is the lazy counterpart of the greedy quantifier **{**_n_**,}**.
trans-unit.target: 它是贪婪限定符 **{**_n_**,}** 的惰性对应项。

trans-unit.source: See the example for the **{**_n_**}?**
trans-unit.target: 有关说明，请参见上面部分中的 **{**_n_**}?**

trans-unit.source: quantifier in the previous section for an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 限定符示例。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression in that example uses the **{**_n_**,}** quantifier to match a string that has at least three characters followed by a period.
trans-unit.target: 该示例中的正则表达式使用 **{**_n_**,}** 限定符匹配包含后跟一个句点的至少三个字符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Match between n and m times (lazy match): {n,m}?
trans-unit.target: 匹配 n 到 m 次（惰性匹配）：{n,m}?

trans-unit.source: quantifier matches the preceding element between *n* and *m* times, where *n* and *m* are integers, but as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 限定符与前面的元素匹配 n 到 m 次，其中 n 和 m 是任何整数，但次数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: It is the lazy counterpart of the greedy quantifier **{**_n_**,**_m_**}**.
trans-unit.target: 它是贪婪限定符 **{**_n_**,**_m_**}** 的惰性对应项。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the regular expression `\b[A-Z](\w*\s+){1,10}?[.!?]` matches sentences that contain between one and ten words.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，正则表达式 `\b[A-Z](\w*\s+){1,10}?[.!?]` 匹配包含一到十个单词的句子。

trans-unit.source: It matches all the sentences in the input string except for one sentence that contains 18 words.
trans-unit.target: 它可匹配输入字符串中的所有句子（除了包含 18 个单词的一个句子）。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Start at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match an uppercase character from A to Z.
trans-unit.target: 匹配从 A 到 Z 的大写字符。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or more word characters, followed by one or more white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或多个后跟一个或多个空白字符的单词字符。

trans-unit.source: This is the first capture group.
trans-unit.target: 这是第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Match the previous pattern between 1 and 10 times, but as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 与前面的模式匹配 1 到 10 次，但次数尽可能少。

trans-unit.source: Match any one of the punctuation characters ".", "!", or "?".
trans-unit.target: 匹配标点字符“.”、“!”或“?”中的任何一种。

trans-unit.source: Greedy and lazy quantifiers
trans-unit.target: 贪婪与惰性限定符

trans-unit.source: A number of the quantifiers have two versions:
trans-unit.target: 一些限定符具有两个版本：

trans-unit.source: A greedy version.
trans-unit.target: 贪婪版本。

trans-unit.source: A greedy quantifier tries to match an element as many times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 贪婪限定符尝试尽可能多地匹配元素。

trans-unit.source: •A non-greedy (or lazy) version.
trans-unit.target: • 非贪婪（或惰性）版本。

trans-unit.source: A non-greedy quantifier tries to match an element as few times as possible.
trans-unit.target: 非贪婪限定符尝试尽可能少地匹配元素。

trans-unit.source: You can turn a greedy quantifier into a lazy quantifier by simply adding a **?**.
trans-unit.target: 只需通过添加 **?**，便可以将贪婪限定符转换为惰性限定符。

trans-unit.source: Consider a simple regular expression that is intended to extract the last four digits from a string of numbers such as a credit card number.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑一个简单的正则表达式，它旨在从数字字符串（如信用卡号）中提取最后四位数。

trans-unit.source: The version of the regular expression that uses the **\*** greedy quantifier is `\b.*([0-9]{4})\b`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 **\*** 贪婪限定符的正则表达式版本是 `\b.*([0-9]{4})\b`。

trans-unit.source: However, if a string contains two numbers, this regular expression matches the last four digits of the second number only, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果字符串包含两个数字，则此正则表达式仅匹配第二个数字的最后四位数，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression fails to match the first number because the **\*** quantifier tries to match the previous element as many times as possible in the entire string, and so it finds its match at the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式无法匹配第一个数字，因为 **\*** 限定符尝试在整个字符串中尽可能多地匹配前面的元素，因此它会在字符串末尾找到其匹配项。

trans-unit.source: This is not the desired behavior.
trans-unit.target: 这不是所需行为。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use the **\*?**
trans-unit.target: 可以改为使用 **\*?**

trans-unit.source: lazy quantifier to extract digits from both numbers, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 惰性限定符从这两个数字提取数字，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, regular expressions with greedy and lazy quantifiers return the same matches.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，具有贪婪和惰性限定符的正则表达式返回相同匹配项。

trans-unit.source: They most commonly return different results when they are used with the wildcard (**.**) metacharacter, which matches any character.
trans-unit.target: 它们最常在与匹配任何字符的通配符 (**.**) 元字符一起使用时返回不同的结果。

trans-unit.source: Quantifiers and empty matches
trans-unit.target: 限定符和空匹配项

trans-unit.source: The quantifiers **\***, **+**, and **{**_n_**,**_m_**}** and their lazy counterparts never repeat after an empty match when the minimum number of captures has been found.
trans-unit.target: 限定符 **\***、**+** 和 **{**_n_**,**_m_**}** 及其惰性对应项在已找到最小捕获数时，绝不会在空匹配项后面重复。

trans-unit.source: This rule prevents quantifiers from entering infinite loops on empty subexpression matches when the maximum number of possible group captures is infinite or near infinite.
trans-unit.target: 此规则会在最大可能组捕获数是无限或接近无限时，阻止限定符在空的子表达式匹配项上进入无限循环。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code shows the result of a call to the [Regex.Match](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String)) method with the regular expression pattern `(a?)*,` which matches zero or one "a" character zero or more times.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的代码演示使用正则表达式模式 `(a?)*,`（与零个或一个“a”字符匹配零次或多次）调用 [Regex.Match](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String)) 方法的结果。

trans-unit.source: Note that the single capturing group captures each "a" as well as [String.Empty](xref:System.String.Empty), but that there is no second empty match, because the first empty match causes the quantifier to stop repeating.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，单个捕获组会捕获每个“a”以及 [String.Empty](xref:System.String.Empty)，但是不存在第二个空匹配项，因为第一个空匹配项会使限定符停止重复。

trans-unit.source: To see the practical difference between a capturing group that defines a minimum and a maximum number of captures and one that defines a fixed number of captures, consider the regular expression patterns `(a\1|(?(1)\1)){0,2}` and `(a\1|(?(1)\1)){2}`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看定义最小和最大捕获数的捕获组与定义固定捕获数的捕获组之间的实际差异，请考虑正则表达式模式 `(a\1|(?(1)\1)){0,2}` 和 `(a\1|(?(1)\1)){2}`。

trans-unit.source: Both regular expressions consist of a single capturing group, which is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 这两个正则表达式包含单个捕获组，其定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Either match "a" along with the value of the first captured group …
trans-unit.target: 匹配“a”以及第一个捕获组的值...

trans-unit.source: or test whether the first captured group has been defined.
trans-unit.target: 或测试是否定义了第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: (Note that the **(?(1)** construct does not define a capturing group.)
trans-unit.target: （请注意， **(?(1)** 构造不定义捕获组。）

trans-unit.source: If the first captured group exists, match its value.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个捕获组存在，则匹配其值。

trans-unit.source: If the group does not exist, the group will match [String.Empty](xref:System.String.Empty).
trans-unit.target: 如果该组不存在，则组会匹配 [String.Empty](xref:System.String.Empty)。

trans-unit.source: The first regular expression tries to match this pattern between zero and two times; the second, exactly two times.
trans-unit.target: 第一个正则表达式尝试与此模式匹配零到二次；第二个正则表达式尝试恰好匹配两次。

trans-unit.source: Because the first pattern reaches its minimum number of captures with its first capture of [String.Empty](xref:System.String.Empty), it never repeats to try to match `a\1;` the `{0,2}` quantifier allows only empty matches in the last iteration.
trans-unit.target: 因为第一个模式在第一次捕获 [String.Empty](xref:System.String.Empty) 时达到其最小捕获数，所以它绝不会重复尝试匹配 `a\1;`，`{0,2}` 限定符仅允许在最后一个迭代中存在空匹配。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the second regular expression does match "a" because it evaluates `a\1` a second time; the minimum number of iterations, 2, forces the engine to repeat after an empty match.
trans-unit.target: 相反，第二个正则表达式匹配“a”，因为它会第二次计算 `a\1`；最小迭代数 2 会强制引擎在空匹配项后面重复。

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: [Regular expression language - quick reference](quick-ref.md)
trans-unit.target: [正则表达式语言 - 快速参考](quick-ref.md)

trans-unit.source: [Backtracking in regular expressions](backtracking.md)
trans-unit.target: [正则表达式中的回溯](backtracking.md)
